cpb-info: The new site you create will be owned by you. You can add more owners, members, etc. to the site after the site creation
cpb-site-url-label: Custom address (leave empty if you want us to auto generate the url)
loginMessage: When you login we get your email adress, name, and photo url from the login provider. You can review and manage the user data we save on your profile page.
loginPs: We create you a profile on first login. Please note, due to the platform limitations, you can only login using the provider you used the first time.
